userCreation.subject: Registration successful
userCreation.body:
The account registration was successful.
You will be able to log in as soon as the account has been activated by an administrator.

The login name is {login}
And your password is: {password}

The password can be changed at any time in the user settings.

resetPassword.subject: Your password has been reset
resetPassword.body: Your password has been reset, the new password is: {password}
